entries.name: Armored
entries.description: You ignore the clumsy tag on armor you wear.

entries.name: Bloody Aegis
entries.description: When you take damage you can grit your teeth and accept the blow. If you do you take no damage but instead suffer a debility of your choice. If you already have all six debilities you can’t use this move.

entries.name: Charge!
entries.description: When you lead the charge into combat, those you lead take +1 forward.

entries.name: Divine Authority
entries.description: Take +1 to order hirelings. When you roll a 12+ the hireling transcends their moment of fear and doubt and carries out your order with particular effectiveness or efficiency.

entries.name: Divine Favor
entries.description: Dedicate yourself to a deity (name a new one or choose one that’s already been established). You gain the commune and cast a spell cleric moves. When you select this move, treat yourself as a cleric of level 1 for using spells. Every time you gain a level thereafter, increase your effective cleric level by 1.

entries.name: Divine Protection
entries.description: You get +2 armor while on a Quest.

entries.name: Ever Onward
entries.description: When you lead the charge into combat, those you lead take +1 forward and +2 armor forward.

entries.name: Evidence Of Faith
entries.description: When you see divine magic as it happens, you can ask the GM which deity granted the spell and its effects. Take +1 when acting on the answers.

entries.name: Exterminatus
entries.description:
When you speak aloud your promise to defat an enemy, you deal +2d4 damage against that enemy and -4 damage against anyone else. This effect lasts until the enemy is defeated. If you fail to defeat the enemy or give up the fight, you can admit your failure, but the effect continues until you find a way to redeem yourself.

Additional damage roll: [[/roll 2d4]]

entries.name: Holy Protection
entries.description: You get +1 armor while on a Quest.

entries.name: Holy Smite
entries.description:
While on a Quest you deal +1d8 damage.

Additional damage roll: [[/roll 1d8]]

entries.name: Hospitaller
entries.description:
When you heal an ally, you heal +1d8 damage.

Additional healing roll: [[/roll 1d8]]

entries.name: I Am The Law
entries.description:
When you give an NPC an order based on your divine authority, roll+Cha. • On a 7+, they choose one:

  • Do what you say.
  • Back away cautiously, then flee.
  • Attack you.

On a 10+, you also take +1 forward against them. • On a miss, they do as they please and you take -1 forward against them.

entries.name: Impervious Defender
entries.description: When you Defend you always get +1 hold, even on a 6-. When you get a 12+ to defend instead of getting hold the nearest attacking creature is stymied giving you a clear advantage, the GM will describe it.

entries.name: Indomitable
entries.description: When you suffer a debility (even through Bloody Aegis) take +1 forward against whatever caused it.

entries.name: Lay On Hands
entries.description: When you touch someone, skin to skin, and pray for their well-being, roll+CHA. • On a 10+ you heal 1d8 damage or remove one disease. • On a 7–9, they are healed, but the damage or disease is transferred to you.

entries.name: Perfect Hospitaller
entries.description:
When you heal an ally, you heal +2d8 damage.

Additional healing roll: [[/roll 2d8]]

entries.name: Perfect Knight
entries.description: When you Quest you choose three boons instead of two.

entries.name: Quest
entries.description:
When you dedicate yourself to a mission through prayer and ritual cleansing, state what you set out to do:

  • Slay ______________, a great blight on the land.
  • Defend _____________ from the iniquities that beset them.
  • Discover the truth of ____________________.

Then choose up to two boons:

  • An unwavering sense of direction to _______________________
  • Invulnerability to _____________ (edged weapons, fire, enchantment, etc.)
  • A mark of divine authority.
  • Senses that pierce lies.
  • A voice that transcends language.
  • Freedom from hunger, thirst, and sleep.

The GM will then tell you what vow or vows is required of you to maintain your blessing:

  • Honor (forbidden: cowardly tactics and tricks)
  • Temperance (forbidden: gluttony in food, drink, and pleasure of the flesh)
  • Piety (required: observance of daily holy services)
  • Valor (forbidden: suffering an evil creature to live)
  • Truth (forbidden: lies)
  • Hospitality (required: comfort to those in need, no matter who they are)

entries.name: Setup Strike
entries.description:
When you Hack & Slash, choose an ally. Their next attack against your target does +1d4 damage.

Additional damage roll: [[/roll 1d4]]

entries.name: Smite
entries.description:
While on a Quest you deal +1d4 damage.

Additional damage roll: [[/roll 1d4]]

entries.name: Staunch Defender
entries.description: When you Defend you always get +1 hold, even on a 6-.

entries.name: Tandem Strike
entries.description:
When you Hack & Slash, choose an ally. Their next attack against your target does +1d4 damage and they take +1 forward against them.

Additional damage roll: [[/roll 1d4]]

entries.name: Voice Of Authority
entries.description: Take +1 to order hirelings.
